event.label: This is an open event where students can win book vouchers worth Rs.10000.00 by answering multiple choice questions.

instructionPage.title: Important points :
instructionPage.instructionPoint2: Each question will have a time limit of 2 minutes.
instructionPage.instructionPoint3: Choose the most correct answer to the question.
instructionPage.instructionPoint4: Each question can be answered only once.
instructionPage.instructionPoint6: Whoever answers all the questions correctly in the least time wins.
instructionPage.instructionPoint7: The winner will be notified by email.
